Read the data
```{r}
rawdata <- read.csv("activity.csv")
summary(rawdata)
```


Find the steps per day (spd), plot histogram and report mean and median
```{r}
library(dplyr)
days <-group_by(rawdata, date)
spd <- summarize(days, steps=sum(steps))

hist(spd$steps,
        xlab="Steps per day",
        col="red")

summary(spd)
```
